messages.speech: "Description": "Double decoding is a problem which often occurs when multiple servers are used in which aconfiguration error is made.A hacker can encode his payload differently so it will not be recognized by a Web Application Firewall (WAF) or an Intrusion Detection System (IDS) and also bypass the escaping of the application.By using double encoding it's possible to bypass security filters that only decode userinput once. The second decoding process is executed by the backend platform or modulesthat properly handle encoded data, but don't have the corresponding security checks inplace.Attackers can inject double encoding in pathnames or query strings to bypass theauthentication scheme and security filters in use by the web application.",
